data.name: revosim
data.description: REvoSim - The [R]apid [Evo]lutionary [Sim]ulator - An individual-based evolutionary model

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "If you wish to use REvoSim and utility packages for research or any other purpose without modifying the software, they can be installed from the binary releases on our [GitHub](https://github.com/pala"

"REvoSim is an evolutionary model that aims to bridge the epistemological gap between micro- and macroevolution by providing an organism-level simulation... We intend REvoSim as a multipurpose platform for the study of many evolutionary phenomena" (end-user simulation application).

"If you wish to use REvoSim and utility packages for research or any other purpose without modifying the software, they can be installed from the binary releases on our GitHub." (distributed via binary releases / builds).
